name: Chapter 2: A New World
short_description: Confused and disoriented, Sarah starts exploring the parallel world. She encounters mystical creatures and starts understanding that magic is real here.
to_next_chapter: Sarah meets locals who explain the basics of the world.

beats.long_title: Sarah Wakes Up Disoriented in the New Parallel World
beats.description: Sarah awakes in a strange new environment. Disoriented and confused, she tries to make sense of her surroundings and recalls the events that led to her arrival.

beats.long_title: Sarah Tentatively Explores Her Immediate Surroundings
beats.description: Sarah takes her first steps in the new world, observing strange plants and unusual landscape features. Her engineering mind tries to rationalize what she's seeing.

beats.long_title: Sarah's First Encounter with a Mystical Creature
beats.description: Sarah encounters her first mystical creature, which appears both fascinating and terrifying. The creature is friendly but otherworldly, making her realize the gravity of her situation.
Drawn by the beauty and strangeness of the forest, Sarah ventures deeper into it, sensing an inexplicable pull. The forest seems alive, responding to her presence.

beats.long_title: Sarah Experiences the Magical Ambiance of the Forest
beats.description: Within the forest, Sarah encounters glowing plants, floating lights, and hears whispers in a language she doesn't understand. The magic of the place becomes undeniable.
Sarah accidentally triggers a magical event—a spark of light appears from her hands as she touches a glowing tree. She is both shocked and amazed by this newfound ability.

beats.long_title: Sarah Notices the Unusual Skies of the Parallel World
beats.description: Looking up, Sarah observes the sky, noticing unfamiliar constellations, a larger moon, and peculiar cloud formations, driving home the fact that she’s far from home.

beats.long_title: Sarah Finds Some Familiarity in the Strange World
beats.description: Amidst the otherworldly elements, Sarah discovers things somewhat akin to Earth—certain types of plants, the basic behavior of animals, etc., providing a small sense of comfort.

beats.long_title: Sarah's Engineering Curiosity Drives Her Exploration
beats.description: Driven by her engineering background, Sarah starts to take notes, diagrams, and sketches of what she observes, already thinking of the potential applications and implications.

beats.long_title: Sarah Finds Resolve to Understand and Master This New World
beats.description: As the day concludes, Sarah finds a quiet spot to rest. Contemplating her experiences, she resolves to understand this world better, convinced that her engineering skills combined with magic could make a difference.
